name: Memory Den
description:
This is a short game made in Unity 5 for Pizza Jam 2!  You play a brief memory game on a retro TV.  High scores are stored on your PC but I will eventually add an online leader board.  Hope you enjoy!  

Controls

The buttons on the TV control pausing, starting the game, quitting, and moving to different areas.  To play the game on the TV you [press the start button then click the colored boxes in the correct order on the screen.
